title: How to Use Salted Black Beans

steps.headline: Buy the salted black beans.
steps.description: They will be in small plastic bags, usually from Chinese groceries.

steps.headline: Wash the beans well.
steps.description: Place them in a colander or sieve and run water over them to clean.

steps.headline: Use whole or chopped.
steps.description: This will depend on the requirements of your recipe. However you use them, use sparingly as they are very salty and serve best as a condiment or flavouring only.

steps.headline: Heat to change their appearance.
steps.description: Upon heating, salted black beans will turn shiny and glossy black. This makes them perfect for adding as a condiment on the table.

steps.headline: Store them in an airtight container.
steps.description: Leave them in a cool and dark place; they should keep indefinitely.

text: Buy the salted black beans. They will be in small plastic bags, usually from Chinese groceries. Wash the beans well. Place them in a colander or sieve and run water over them to clean. Use whole or chopped. This will depend on the requirements of your recipe. However you use them, use sparingly as they are very salty and serve best as a condiment or flavouring only. Heat to change their appearance. Upon heating, salted black beans will turn shiny and glossy black. This makes them perfect for adding as a condiment on the table. Store them in an airtight container. Leave them in a cool and dark place; they should keep indefinitely.
